Definition: Given a sentence in English language, translate the sentence to Somali language keeping the meaning of the original sentence intact

Positive Examples.input: English sentence: Lionel Messi is the greatest football player of all time
Positive Examples.output: Lionel Messi waa ciyaaryahanka ugu weyn kubadda cagta abid
Positive Examples.explanation: The output exactly translates the sentence to it's somali equivalent. Even though the phrase 'greatest player of all times' is translated to 'greatest player ever', the meaning remains the same.

Positive Examples.input: English sentence: Photosynthesis is a method used by plants and other organisms to convert light energy into chemical energy
Positive Examples.output: Photosynthesis waa hab ay adeegsadaan dhirta iyo noolaha kale si ay tamarta iftiinka ugu beddelaan tamar kiimiko.
Positive Examples.explanation: The output is the exact Somali translation of the input English text.

Positive Examples.input: English sentence: I ate cereal for breakfast
Positive Examples.explanation: The Somali translation exactly means the same as the input English sentence.

Negative Examples.input: English sentence: The first Italian Grand Prix took place on 4 September 1921 at a 10.7-mile (17.3 km) circuit near Montichiari
Negative Examples.output: Tartanka Grand Prix-kii ugu horreeyay ee Talyaanigu wuxuu dhacay 4tii Sebtember 1921 goob 10.7-mayl (17.3 km) u dhow Montichiari
Negative Examples.explanation: Even though the sentence says the 'first Italian grand prix', the somali translation say's 'Italy's first grand prix' which is wrong as Italy had grand prix races before but it was not name the Italian grand prix.

Negative Examples.input: English sentence: The human stomach can dissolve razor blades
Negative Examples.output: Caloosha bani -aadmigu waxay kala diri kartaa baalasha
Negative Examples.explanation: The Somali translation of the english sentence means 'Human stomach can expand it's wings' which is wrong

Negative Examples.input: English sentence: We are only as strong as we are united, as weak as we are divided
Negative Examples.output: Waxaan nahay uun sida aan u midowno, sida aan u kala qaybsannahay
Negative Examples.explanation: The Somali translation 'We are just how united we are, how divided we are' does not make any sense and it's not the actual translation of the original english sentence.

Instances.input: English sentence: Some people confuse Somaliland with Puntland for either ignorance or for futile political reasons. Puntland is an integral part of Somalia because it is located within Somalia`s colonial borders (Italian-drawn borders) with which Somalia achieved independence on July 1st, 1960 and shares people and history with Somalia. Unlike Somaliland Republic, which has the rightful claim of independence and recognition for having its own, unique colonial borders with which it achieved independence and diplomatic recognition on June 26, 1960, Puntland can not be recognized as independent state because it is part of Somalia and because it does not have its own and unique colonial borders that promote independence and recognition in Africa, but it can be federal region within Somalia.
output: Dadka qaar ayaa isku khalda Jamhuuriyadda Somaliland iyo Maamulka Majeerteeniya (Puntland) oo ah gobol ka tirsan Somalia taas oo ay ugu wacantahay aqoon la`aan ka haysata xagga taariikhda Somalida. Somaliland waa dal madaxbanaan oo leh xuduudo aan cidi la wadaagin oo ay ka dhaxashay Gumaysigii Ingiriiska kuwaas oo ay ku qaadatay gobonimo bishii Juun 26, 1960 halka Puntland tahay gobol ka tirsan Somalia oo la wadaaga xuduud, xuduudaas oo ay Somalia ka dhaxashay Gumaysigii Talyaaniga kuna qaadatay gobonimo bishii July 1, 1960. Somaliland waa dal xaq u leh dawladnimo gaar ah iyo aqoonsiga caalamka sababta oo ah waxa uu leeyahay xuduud u gaar halka Puntland tahay gobol Somalia la wadaaga xuduudda sidaas awgeedna aan si gaar ah loo aqoonsankarin ama helikarin aqoonsiga caalamka.

Larsen. “Waxay ahayd sheeko cajiib ah.” Markii ay dhammaatey dhammaadkii Octoobar 4, 18 askari ayaa la dilay, 80 kalena way ku dhaawacmeen, laakiin ciidamada Maraykanku waxay ku dagaalameen Muqdisho si ay u helaan xubno ka tirsan waaxda rasmiga ah ee isbahaysiga dagaalka, inkastoo duqeymo culus .
